title: Monster Almost Slain!!!  Can you help???
author: Johnny T

posts.post_title: Monster Almost Slain!!!  Can you help???
posts.post_content:
Hello Fellow Net54'ers:

I am at 515 of 520...looking to get to 517....

I am specifically looking for just 2 right now.  Poland in any back and SL'er Ray Ryan preferably in an Old Mill.  The other 3 are Green Cobb, Demmitt and O'Hara (St Louis) and I honestly don't have the funds for any of those 3 just yet.

Condition for Poland and Ryan would ideally be between PR to VG...raw or graded, I'm fine with either...

PM me if you have any you are willing to sell.

Appreciate the help!

Kindest regards,

JT
